data.actual_result: They don't wrap und overlap itself or get cut off.
data.expected_result: Profile headers should wrap when being too long (as it already happens when using non-scaled font size).
data.short_description: [4 & 4.7 inch - English] [Bigger sizes - other languages] Profil headers overlap itself or get cut off instead of getting wrapped when using font scaling
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your iOS settings - Open Display & Brightness -> Text Size - Change your size to the latest one (7th option) - Go back to Discord - If you are using a 5.5 inch & bigger device, change the language to one whose translations for the profile headers are longer than the English one (e.g. German or Dutch) - Long hold a user and open the User Settings - Observe the profile headers (Mutual servers, Mutual friends, ...)
